this.aide = DPSMate.L["moveleftTooltip"] getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("<---")
local pa = this:GetParent():GetName() for i=1, 15 do if getglobal(pa.."_right_Button"..i).selected then local num = getglobal(pa.."_right_Button"..i.."Text"):GetText() DPSMateSettings["hiddenmodes"][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] = nil DPSMate.Options.Options[1]["args"][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] = nil DPSMate.Options:UpdateConfigModes(getglobal(pa.."_left"), 0, true) DPSMate.Options:UpdateConfigModes(getglobal(pa.."_right"), 0, false) DPSMate.Options.Options[1]["args"][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] = { order = 300, type = 'toggle', name = num, desc = "Show "..num..",", get = function() return DPSMateSettings["windows"][DPSMate.Options.Dewdrop:GetOpenedParent().Key]["options"][1][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] end, set = function() DPSMate.Options:ToggleDrewDrop(1, DPSMate.ModuleNames[num], DPSMate.Options.Dewdrop:GetOpenedParent()) end, } break end end
this.aide = DPSMate.L["moverightTooltip"] getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("--->")
local pa = this:GetParent():GetName() for i=1, 15 do if getglobal(pa.."_left_Button"..i).selected then local num = getglobal(pa.."_left_Button"..i.."Text"):GetText() DPSMateSettings["hiddenmodes"][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] = true DPSMate.Options.Options[1]["args"][DPSMate.ModuleNames[num]] = nil DPSMate.Options:UpdateConfigModes(getglobal(pa.."_left"), 0, true) DPSMate.Options:UpdateConfigModes(getglobal(pa.."_right"), 0, false) break end end
